title.narrative: DPSP II: Renewable Energy Sector Development Project

description.narrative: The objective of the Renewable Energy Sector Development Project is to support the Government of Saint Lucia to assess the viability of harnessing indigenous renewable energy resources, in particular geothermal energy. Public financing of a drilling campaign will reduce the upstream resource risk and will make it more likely to attract a private developer to continue to develop the project, with the goal of successfully commissioning an estimated 30 MW power plant. The proposed project will reduce 123,463 ton of GHG annually, which will contribute to achieving St. Lucia’s NDC target of reducing 188,000 ton CO2eq in 2030 compared to a Business As Usual scenario.
